titleStmt.title: The mirrour of madnes, or a paradoxe maintayning madnes to be most excellent: done out of French into English, by Ia. San. gent
titleStmt.author: Sandford, James.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Fleetestreate, neare to S. Dunstones Church by Thomas Marshe,

notesStmt.note: A translation, by James Sandford, of the French original.
Running title reads: The mirroure of madnes.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
